summary.span: 当整个查找操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the entire find operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含有关所有匹配服务的信息。The property contains information about all matching services. 有关此事件的详细信息，请参阅 [异步查找](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample)。For more information about this event, see [Asynchronous Find](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample).

summary.span: 每当客户端接收来自特定服务的响应时发生。

span.span: Occurs every time the client receives a response from a particular service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要在这些响应到达时处理结果，则此事件很有用。This event is useful if you are processing the results as they arrive. 有关此事件的详细信息，请参阅 [异步查找](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample)。For more information about this event, see [Asynchronous Find](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/asynchronous-find-sample).
